author: James Martin
method: Place all the ingredients in a blender and purée. Just before serving, place the purée in a saucepan and heat through. Season with salt and freshly ground black pepper and place in the centre of the plate.
ingredients: 450g/1lb defrosted or fresh peas,  handful of basil leaves,  1 tsp ground cumin,  50ml/1¾fl oz natural yoghurt,  salt and freshly ground black pepper
